thread.section_title: Le Relais du Marais - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel
thread.title_full: Good hotel - Review of Le Relais du Marais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Maurizio S
title: Good hotel
text:
We have been here one year ago.
Hotel is still nice even if looks like quality got worst, especially cleaness.
Bathroom quite small but shower is big.
Rooms small (as usual in Paris) and quite.
Breakfast has quite large selection but quality so so.
I stopped in the bathroom at the reception floor and it was quite a mess.
Internet complimentary connection is one of the worst I ever tried.
Overall is still good.
